full_summary:
================================
**Title**
Fiona Storm Damage Reconstruction and Repairs, Codroy NL
### Government of Canada Tender Notice

**Reference Number**
WS4320441710-Doc4332134142

**Tender Status**
This tender notice has expired.

**Tender Details**

* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services (CNST)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify
* **Location**: Codroy, Newfoundland and Labrador

**Scope of Work**

The successful contractor will be responsible for furnishing all necessary plant, labour, equipment, and materials for the Fiona storm damage reconstruction and repairs in Codroy, NL. The contract includes the work listed in the specifications and accompanying drawings. The contractor shall ensure compliance with all terms and conditions of the contract.

**Deadlines**

* **Closing Date**: 2023-12-14 14:00:00
* **Contract Commencement Date**: Not specified

**Evaluation Criteria**

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

**Trade Agreements**

The solicitation is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Contact Information**

For any questions or concerns, please contact:

Timothy Beausoleil
PSPC/SPAC
 Phone: Not available
 Email: [timothy.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:timothy.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Supporting Documents**

The complete tender package and/or any queries may be viewed on Ariba's discovery portal at the following URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18153885?extsite=MTgxNTM4ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Estimated Contract Value**

The estimated value of the contract ranges from $5,000,001 to $20,000,000.
